description: This supernaturally beautiful woman looks human, yet emanates a strange sense of calm and benevolence.
name: Aasimar
special_attacks: channel positive energy (5/day, 1d6, DC 12), rebuke death (1d4+1, 6/day), touch of good (6/day)

name: Aboleth

description: This towering humanoid creature has shining topaz eyes, metallic skin, and three pairs of white wings.
name: Solar Angel

description: This burrowing, bug-like monster scuttles about on six legs, drooling noxious green ichor from its clacking mandibles.
name: Ankheg

description: A thin, six-legged ant the size of a pony stands at the ready, its mandibles chittering and its stinger dripping with venom.
name: Giant Ant

description: Sharp teeth fill this large, feral ape's mouth, and its long, muscular arms stretch to the ground, ending in wickedly curved claws.
name: Dire Ape
Barghest
spell_like_abilities: (CL 6th)At will-blink, levitate, misdirection1/day-charm monster (DC 16), crushing despair (DC 16), dimension door

description: This squat, reptilian monster has eight legs, bony spurs jutting from its back, and eyes that glow with pale green fire.
name: Basilisk

description: This giant, furry bat is nearly the size of an ox, with dark leathery wings that open wider than two men with arms outstretched.
name: Dire Bat

description: Spittle drips from this feral bear's roaring maw, and its matted fur is broken in places by wicked, bony growths.
name: Dire Bear

description: Broad, powerful muscles move beneath this massive bear's brown fur, promising both speed and lethal force.
name: Grizzly Bear

description: With a sleek body and huge mandibles raised in a threatening pose, this large beetle stands firm in defense of its territory.
name: Giant Stag Beetle

description: This ill-tempered beast's tiny, bloodshot eyes glare angrily above a mouth filled with sharp tusks.
name: Boar

description: The back of this horse-sized boar rises in a steep slope. Its tiny red eyes are crusted with filth and its bristly flank crawls with flies.
name: Dire Boar

description: This dark-furred creature raises a spiked morningstar, its tiny, milk-white eyes glittering with the thrill of the coming kill.
name: Bugbear

description: This armor-plated creature's toothy maw gapes wide as a fin-like dorsal plate rises between its shoulders.
name: Bulette

description: This creature has the sun-bronzed upper body of a seasoned warrior and the lower body of a sleek warhorse.
name: Centaur

description: This lengthy, segmented horror writhes and twists, pulsing its venomous mandibles in search of prey.
name: Giant Centipede

description: This winged monster has the body of a lion, though two more heads flank its central feline one-a dragon and a horned goat.
name: Chimera

description: This hideous avian creature has the body of an emaciated rooster, the wings of a bat, and a long, scaly tail.
name: Cockatrice

description: This lumbering hard-shelled crab stands as tall as a dwarf, its massive pincers waving menacingly.
name: Giant Crab

description: This reptile lunges out of the placid water with shocking speed. Its jaw gapes open in a roar, its powerful tail lashing behind.
name: Crocodile

description: This reptilian behemoth, a crocodile of monstrous proportions, is large enough to swallow a horse in one tremendous bite.
name: Dire Crocodile
special_attacks: death roll (3d6+19 plus trip), swallow whole (3d6+13, AC 16, 13 hp)

description: A single huge eye stares from the forehead of this nine-foot-tall giant. Below this sole orb, an even larger mouth gapes like a cave.
name: Cyclops

description: Four arms grace the torso of this towering monstrosity. The monster's eyes shine with a mix of intelligence and cruelty.
name: Glabrezu Demon

description: Ram horns curl back from the twisted head of this tiny winged demon, and its body is thin and wiry.
name: Quasit Demon

name: Barbed Devil

name: Horned Devil

name: Ice Devil

name: Imp Devil

description: This dry, hovering corpse's chest is a prison of jagged ribs, within which is trapped a small tormented ghostly form.
name: Devourer

description: This dark-skinned elf stands in a battle-ready pose, her hair silver and eyes white and pupilless.
name: Drow
spell_like_abilities: (CL 1st)1/day-dancing lights, darkness, faerie fire

name: Drow Noble

description: This strange, beautiful woman has flesh that seems made of wood and vibrant hair that resembles leaves and blossoms.
name: Dryad

description: This bald, long-bearded dwarf has dull gray skin, low arching brows, and eyes that seem to absorb rather than reflect the light.
name: Duergar
spell_like_abilities: (CL 3rd)1/day-enlarge person (self only), invisibility (self only)

description: This magnificent bird of prey has dark feathers save for those on its head, which are pure white.
name: Eagle

description: This immense eagle's feathers are golden brown and shimmer in the light. Its sharp beak and curved talons are dark yellow.
name: Giant Eagle

description: These thick-skinned animals bear large ivory tusks flanking a long, prehensile snout.
name: Elephant

description: This creature is larger than a normal elephant, with enormous sweeping tusks and shaggy brown fur on its body.
name: Mastodon Elephant

description: This hideous purple creature walks upright like a man, but its face is that of a spider, and its hands are sickle-shaped claws.
name: Ettercap

description: This lumbering, filthy, two-headed giant wears tattered remnants of leather armor and clutches a large flail in each fist.
name: Ettin

description: This creature looks like a normal frog, with moist, mottled, blackish-green skin, but grown to truly monstrous size.
name: Giant Frog
special_attacks: pull (tongue, 5 feet), swallow whole (1d4 bludgeoning damage, AC 10, 1 hp), tongue

description: This small frog is bright green and red, with electric-blue stripes on its hind legs.
name: Poison Frog

description: Bits of broken weapons, coins, and a partially digested skeleton are visible inside this quivering cube of slime.
name: Gelatinous Cube

description: This creature stands nearly twice as tall as a human, although its lower torso trails away into a vortex of mist and wind.
name: Djinni Genie
special_attacks: air mastery, whirlwind (1/10 minutes, 10-50 ft. tall, 1d8+4 damage, DC 17)

description: This muscular giant has crimson skin, smoldering eyes, and small black horns. Smoke rises in curls from its flesh.
name: Efreeti Genie

description: This spectral, horrifying figure glides silently through the air, passing through solid objects as if they didn't exist.
name: Ghost

description: This humanoid creature has long, sharp teeth, and its pallid flesh is stretched tightly over its starved frame.
name: Ghoul
special_attacks: paralysis (1d4+1 rounds, DC 13, elves are immune to this effect)

description: This towering giant has finely chiseled features. Her skin is pale and smooth, and her long wispy hair flutters as if in a breeze.
name: Cloud Giant
spell_like_abilities: (CL 16th)At will-levitate (self plus 2,000 lbs.), obscuring mist1/day-fog cloud

description: This lumbering giant has short stumpy legs and powerful, muscular arms. Its hair and beard seem to be made of fire.
name: Fire Giant

description: This giant looks like a thick, muscular human. It has frost-white skin and long, light blue hair that it wears braided.
name: Frost Giant

description: This hunched giant exudes power and a crude, stupid anger, its filthy fur clothing bespeaking a brutish and backwoods lifestyle.
name: Hill Giant

description: This giant has chiseled, muscular features and a flat, forward-sloping head, looking almost as if it were carved of stone.
name: Stone Giant

description: This giant is a towering, muscular human of heroic proportions, with bronze skin, dark hair, and sparkling green eyes.
name: Storm Giant
spell_like_abilities: (CL 15th)Constant-freedom of movement2/day-control weather, levitate1/day-call lightning (DC 15), chain lightning (DC 18)

description: Hunched and feral, this furred, hyena-headed humanoid stands slightly taller than the average human.
name: Gnoll

description: This creature stands barely three feet tall, its scrawny, humanoid body dwarfed by its wide, ungainly head.
name: Goblin

description: This mangy canine's face has the same flat nose, beady eyes, and protruding teeth as a rat grown grotesquely large.
name: Goblin Dog
Ice Golem
special_attacks: breath weapon (20-ft. cone, 3d6 cold damage, Reflex DC 13 half, usable once every 1d4 rounds), cold (1d6), icy destruction

description: This bull-like creature seems to be made of interlocking metallic plates. Faint plumes of green smoke puff from its mouth.
name: Gorgon
special_attacks: breath weapon (60-foot cone, turn to stone, Fortitude DC 21 negates), trample (2d8+10, DC 21)

description: A seemingly mundane puddle, patch of moist stone, or glistening rock is suddenly revealed to be more as a terrible pseudopod lashes out.
name: Gray Ooze

description: This majestic beast has the body of a lion, the head and forelegs of a great eagle, and a massive pair of feathered wings.
name: Griffon

description: Save for the tattered wings and taloned feet, this creature resembles a feral woman with a wild look about her.
name: Harpy

description: This creature resembles a thin, lanky wolf with reddish-brown fur, white claws, and burning, fiery red eyes.
name: Hell Hound
special_attacks: breath weapon (10-ft. cone, once every 2d4 rounds, 2d6 fire damage, Reflex DC 14 for half)

description: Standing as tall as a human, this muscular, gray-skinned creature peers about with tiny, observant eyes.
name: Hobgoblin

description: This proud horse thunders across the grassy plain with fluid grace, wind tugging at its loose-fitting barding.
name: Horse

description: This squat equine plods forward with large, curious eyes. As it nears, it extends its muzzle, clearly expecting a treat.
name: Pony Horse

description: Multiple angry snake-like heads rise from the sleek, serpentine body of this terrifying monster.
name: Hydra

description: This hyena is covered in shaggy, tan-colored fur with black and brown stripes.
name: Hyena

description: This large hyena has a thick head, rheumy red eyes, and a mouth filled with sharp, powerful teeth.
name: Dire Hyena

description: This short, reptilian humanoid has scaled skin, a snout filled with tiny teeth, and a long tail.
name: Kobold

description: This creature's upper torso is that of a comely woman with cat's eyes and sharp fangs, while her lower body is that of a lion.
name: Lamia

description: A parasite ballooned to monstrous proportions undulates in the muck, its circular maw a spiral of teeth.
name: Giant Leech

description: Once fine robes hang in tatters from this withered corpse's frame. A pale blue light shines from where its eyes should be.
name: Lich
special_attacks: grave touch* (9/day), paralyzing touch (DC 18), power over undead* (9/day, DC 18)

description: This great cat's muscles flex visibly under its skin as it bares its fangs and shakes its thick mane of hair.
name: Lion

description: This immense spotted lion stands as tall as a man at the shoulder, its fur matted with the blood of its victims.
name: Dire Lion

description: This reptilian humanoid has green scales, a short and toothy snout, and a thick alligator-like tail.
name: Lizardfolk

description: This bright-eyed lizard is larger than a horse. As it hisses in anger, a brightly colored frill extends around its neck.
name: Giant Frilled Lizard

description: This immense lizard moves with a slow but relentless gait. Its feet end in large talons, and ropes of drool hang from its toothy maw.
name: Monitor Lizard

description: This creature has a vaguely humanoid head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon. Its tail ends in long, sharp spikes.
name: Manticore

description: This towering insect walks on its back four legs. Its head is triangular and its front legs sport razor-sharp edges and claws.
name: Giant Mantis

description: This slender, attractive woman has strangely glowing eyes and a full head of hissing snakes for hair.
name: Medusa

description: This small humanoid creature has thin, leathery wings, small horns, and a mischievous smile.
name: Mephit
special_attacks: breath weapon (15-foot cone, effect based on type, Reflex DC 13 for half)
spell_like_abilities: (CL 6th)1/day-summon (level 2, 1 mephit of the same type 25%), additional abilities based on mephit type

description: Slipping in and out of the crashing waves, this beautiful woman has the lower torso of a long, slender fish.
name: Merfolk

description: What appeared to be a chest filled with treasure comes to life as it grows long, glistening tentacles and a number of sharp teeth.
name: Mimic

description: Wrapped from head to toe in ancient strips of moldering linen, this humanoid moves with a shuffling gait.
name: Mummy

description: A delicate figure rises from the water, her long ears tapering to points above her head, her beauty painful in its perfection.
name: Nymph
spell_like_abilities: (CL 8th); 1/day-dimension door

description: This yellow-orange amoeboid creature slithers across the ground, pseudopods grasping ahead of its slow approach.
name: Ochre Jelly

description: Eight tentacles, each adorned with rows of countless suckers, unfurl from the barrel-shaped body of this large-eyed creature.
name: Octopus

description: This lumbering giant's beady eyes are devoid of wit or kindness, and its puffy face features a wide mouth with ill-fitting teeth.
name: Ogre

description: This savage creature looks like a bestial version of a savage human, with green-gray skin and greasy black hair.
name: Orc

description: An amalgam of fur and feathers, this bizarre half-bear, half-owl monstrosity raises its huge, ursine claws in anger.
name: Owlbear

description: This magnificient horse has great bird-like wings upon its back and moves with a quiet and proud grace.
name: Pegasus
spell_like_abilities: (CL 4th)Constant-detect evil (60-ft. radius), detect good (60-ft. radius)

description: This large spider-like monster has an eerie, humanoid face surrounded by a shaggy mane of fur.
name: Phase Spider

description: This immense bird seems to be made of living flame. It spreads its wings and gives vent to a musical cry as it takes to the air.
name: Phoenix

description: This tiny, whimsical-looking humanoid darts about swiftly on wildly colored gossamer wings.

description: This filthy rat is the size of a small dog. It has a coat of coarse fur, a long and scabby tail, and two glittering eyes.
name: Dire Rat

description: This rhinoceros has a low-slung head with twisted ears that lie back along its neck.
name: Rhinoceros

description: This scaly humanoid has a long, fish-like tail. Its arms and legs end in webbed claws, and its piscine head features a toothy maw.
name: Sahuagin

description: This handsome, grinning man has the furry legs of a goat and a set of curling ram horns extending from his temples.
name: Satyr
spell_like_abilities: (CL 8th)At will-charm person (DC 15), dancing lights, ghost sound (DC 14), sleep (DC 15), suggestion (DC 17)1/day-fear (DC 18), summon nature's ally III

description: The sixteen-foot-long scorpion scrabbles forward, ferocious claws raised in challenge, stingered tail arched over its back.
name: Giant Scorpion

description: Hair like rotting seaweed drapes this ancient witch. Loose, algae-colored skin sags off her starved frame.
name: Sea Hag

description: This shadowy figure sways and moves with an erratic grace, as if lit by an unseen fire.
name: Greater Shadow
special_attacks: create spawn (as per shadow), strength damage

description: This massive, gray-brown slug leaves a viscous trail of slime in its wake as a long rasping tongue tastes the air for prey.
name: Giant Slug

description: This large snake has a thick, muscular body and dull green scales decorated with dirty brown stripes.
name: Constrictor Snake

description: This brightly colored snake assumes an aggressive posture, its hissing mouth open to display its fangs.
name: Venomous Snake

description: This translucent, ghostly figure fades into view from the damp mist, its face distorted by wrath into a hideous mask.
name: Spectre
special_attacks: create spawn, energy drain (2 levels, DC 16)

description: This creature has the body of a lion, the wings of a falcon, and the head and torso of a beautiful human woman.
name: Sphinx

description: A spider the size of a man crawls silently from the depths of its funnel-shaped web.
name: Giant Spider

description: This insectoid creature has two pairs of bat wings, a tangle of thin legs, and a needle-sharp proboscis.
name: Stirge

description: This bald gnome has rocky gray skin and a wiry physique. Its pale eyes are overly large and expressive.
name: Svirfneblin
special_attacks: favored enemy (dwarf +2), +1 to attack vs. dwarven and reptilian humanoids
spell_like_abilities: (CL 1st)Constant-nondetection1/day-blindness/deafness (DC 12), blur, disguise self

description: This immense reptilian beast towers over the surroundings like a dinosaur, all teeth and horns and claws and thrashing spiked tail.
name: Tarrasque
special_attacks: rush, spines, swallow whole (6d6+22 plus 6d6 acid, AC 27, hp 52)

description: This powerful feline predator moves with a deadly grace, its reddish-orange fur slashed with black stripes.
name: Tiger

description: This large tiger grumbles a warning as it crouches. Two saber-like fangs jut downward from its powerful jaws.
name: Dire Tiger

description: This animated tree's bark is knotted into vaguely humanoid features, with branches for arms and roots for legs.
name: Treant

description: This humanoid's scaly hide is dull gray. Its frame resembles that of a cave lizard, with a long tail and crests on its head and back.
name: Troglodyte

description: This tall creature has rough, green hide. Its hands end in claws, and its bestial face has a hideous, tusked underbite.
name: Troll

description: This magnificent beast looks like a white horse, but with a goat's beard and a single long ivory horn on its brow.
name: Unicorn
spell_like_abilities: (CL 9th)At will-detect evil (as free action), light3/day-cure light wounds1/day-cure moderate wounds, greater teleport (within its forest territory), neutralize poison (DC 21)

description: This alluring, raven-haired beauty casually wipes a trickle of blood from a pale cheek, then smiles to reveal needle-sharp fangs.
name: Vampire
special_attacks: blood drain, children of the night, create spawn, dominate (DC 22), energy drain (2 levels, DC 22)

description: This horse-sized wasp is covered in yellow and black vertical stripes-its stinger is the size of a sword and drips with venom.
name: Giant Wasp

description: The flesh of this walking corpse is rotting and putrid, its body skeletal in places and its eye sockets glowing with red light.
name: Wight
special_attacks: create spawn, energy drain (1 level, DC 14)

description: This faintly glowing ball of light bobs gently in the air, the nebulous image of what might be a skull visible somewhere in its depths.
name: Will-o'-Wisp

description: This powerful canine watches its prey with piercing yellow eyes, darting its tongue across sharp white teeth.
name: Wolf

description: This immense black wolf is the size of a horse, its fangs as large and sharp as knives.
name: Dire Wolf

description: This stocky, muscular mammal is the size of a badger, its snarling lips revealing a mouth full of yellow teeth.
name: Wolverine

description: This terrible wolverine is as large as a bear, its jaws and claws oversized and brutal, its eyes dark and filled with rage.
name: Dire Wolverine

description: This ghostly creature is little more than a dark shape with two flickering pinpoints of light where its eyes should be.
name: Wraith

description: A dark blue dragon, its wings immense and its tail tipped with a hooked stinger, lands on two taloned feet and roars a challenge.
name: Wyvern

description: This creature stands like a man, yet is half again the height of most men and covered with a coat of thick white fur.
name: Yeti
special_attacks: frightful gaze, rend (2 claws, 1d6+6 plus 1d6 cold)
